This is Season 5.  These episodes appear on the last Volume 4 DVD of Futurama. The DVD sets aren't based on seasons as every season had a completely different number of episodes.

Ok everyone needs to get their shit together, is this season 4 or 5?

I'm going to try to explain, the number of seasons and in some cases the episode order in the original FOX broadcast and in the DVD release is different.  Most notably that the first 72 episodes were broadcast over 5 seasons with the DVD release of these episodes over 4.  So this is NOT wrong.
This is season four but Khif was adjusting in order of air date.
